Sentence.sentence: Perhaps a new phrase is needed, one that can bring everyone one big step closer to realizing Du Bois's original, idealistic hope: It's not the name—it's the Thing that counts..

Sentence.sentence: He hopes to distribute this information and help prospective college-goers find the best post-secondary fit.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"希望"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: desire, wish, hope, expect, want, long
means: desire ： 语气较正式庄重，着重渴望的力量与热切，常含有强烈的意图和目的。
wish ： 语气较弱，多指难于实现或不可能实现的愿望。
hope ： 指对愿望实现有一定信心的希望。
expect ： 通常指有很大程度的把握，但仍含有预料之意，或预计某事或某行动的发生。
want ： 一般指所想要的东西是切望得到的东西，能弥补实际需要。
long ： 语气强，指极殷切地盼望着，这种盼望侧重于很难或不可能得到的东西。有时也指一般愿望，但含一定感情色彩。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"期望，指望"之意。
means: expectation ： 指期待某事发生或假设某事能发生，多含揣想的意味。
hope ： 通常指建立在愿望基础上的期待。这种期待有可能发生或实现，但也可能相反。
outlook ： 多指根据征兆或分析对要发生的事情的愿望或预料。
prospect与outlook的含义相近，但侧重对成功、利润和舒适生活等方面的期待。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"希望，期待"之意。
means: hope ： 指希望得到积极、有利的结果，所期待的可能实现，也可能不会实现。
anticipate ： 指对未来的期望，一般是对好事的期待。
await ： 书面用词，指对将要或预料要发生的事怍于期待状态。

phrase.cizu_name: hope springs eternal in the human breast

To hope with little reason or justification.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 一线希望：几乎没有理由地期待

entry.def: If you hope that something is true, or if you hope for something, you want it to be true or to happen, and you usually believe that it is possible or likely.

example.ex: She had decided she must go on as usual, follow her normal routine, and hope and pray...
example.tran: 她打定主意必须像平时一样生活，遵循自己通常的作息规律，同时怀抱希望、虔诚祈祷。

example.ex: He hesitates before leaving, almost as though he had been hoping for conversation...
example.tran: 他离开前有些犹豫，几乎像是他一直期望能够交谈点什么。

entry.def: If you say that you cannot hope for something, or if you talk about the only thing that you can hope to get, you mean that you are in a bad situation, and there is very little chance of improving it.

example.ex: Things aren't ideal, but that's the best you can hope for...
example.tran: 事情并不理想，但你只能指望这样了。

example.ex: I always knew it was too much to hope for.
example.tran: 我一直都知道这是个奢望。

entry.def: Hope is a feeling of desire and expectation that things will go well in the future.

example.ex: Now that he has become President, many people once again have hope for genuine changes in the system...
example.tran: 既然他已当上了总统，很多人又再次看到了进行真正的体制改革的希望。

example.ex: But Kevin hasn't given up hope of being fit...
example.tran: 但凯文仍没有放弃康复的希望。

entry.def: If someone wants something to happen, and considers it likely or possible, you can refer to their hopes of that thing, or to their hope that it will happen.

example.ex: They have hopes of increasing trade between the two regions...
example.tran: 他们希望增进两个地区之间的贸易。

example.ex: The delay in the programme has dashed Japan's hopes of commercial success in space...
example.tran: 该计划的拖延使得日本在太空获得商业性成功的希望化为泡影。

entry.def: If you think that the help or success of a particular person or thing will cause you to be successful or to get what you want, you can refer to them as your hope .
entry.tran: 被寄予希望的人（或事物）

example.ex: ...England's last hope in the English Open Table Tennis Championships...
example.tran: 英格兰队在英国乒乓球公开锦标赛中的最后希望

example.ex: Roemer represented the best hope for a businesslike climate in Louisiana.
example.tran: 罗默最有希望给路易斯安那州带来务实高效之风。

entry.def: If you are in a difficult situation and do something and hope for the best, you hope that everything will happen in the way you want, although you know that it may not.
entry.tran: 从最好的方面想;抱乐观的希望

example.ex: I took the risk and hoped for the best...
example.tran: 我冒了这个险，心里祈祷能够诸事顺利。

example.ex: Some companies are cutting costs and hoping for the best.
example.tran: 有些公司在削减成本，希望一切好转。

entry.def: If you tell someone not to get their hopes up, or not to build their hopes up, you are warning them that they should not become too confident of progress or success.

example.ex: There is no reason for people to get their hopes up over this mission...
example.tran: 不必对这次行动抱太大希望。

example.ex: I don't want you to build your hopes up, but I'll have a word with Fred tomorrow.
example.tran: 我不想让你抱很大希望，但我明天会和弗雷德说一声的。

entry.def: If you say that someone has not got a hope in hell of doing something, you are emphasizing that they will not be able to do it.
entry.tran: 没有一线希望;毫无机会

example.ex: Everybody knows they haven't got a hope in hell of forming a government anyway.
example.tran: 众人皆知他们根本就无力组建政府。

entry.def: If you have high hopes or great hopes that something will happen, you are confident that it will happen.
entry.tran: 很高期望;很大希望;厚望

example.ex: I had high hopes that Derek Randall might play an important part...
example.tran: 我对德里克·兰德尔发挥重要作用寄予厚望。

example.ex: Britain's three-day event team has high hopes of winning the Olympic gold medal...
example.tran: 英国队有很大希望赢得奥运会马术三日赛的金牌。

entry.def: If you hope against hope that something will happen, you hope that it will happen, although it seems impossible.
entry.tran: 存一线希望;抱着万分之一的希望

example.ex: She glanced about the hall, hoping against hope that Richard would be waiting for her.
example.tran: 她眼睛扫过大厅，对理查德会在那里等她仍怀有一丝希望。

entry.def: You use 'I hope' in expressions such as 'I hope you don't mind' and 'I hope I'm not disturbing you', when you are being polite and want to make sure that you have not offended someone or disturbed them.

example.ex: I hope you don't mind me coming to see you...
example.tran: 希望你不介意我来见你。

example.ex: I hope I haven't said anything to upset you.
example.tran: 但愿我没有说过让你不高兴的话。

entry.def: You say 'I hope' when you want to warn someone not to do something foolish or dangerous.
entry.tran: （表示警告他人不要做愚蠢或危险的事）我希望，但愿

example.ex: You're not trying to see him, I hope?...
example.tran: 但愿你不是想要去见他吧？

example.ex: I hope you won't be too harsh with the girl...
example.tran: 希望你不要对那个女孩太严厉。

entry.def: You add 'I hope' to what you are saying to make it sound more polite and less rude or less definite.
entry.tran: （表示更加礼貌和委婉）我希望，我想

example.ex: I'm the best man for the job, I hope...
example.tran: 希望我是那份工作的最佳人选。

example.ex: Fraulein Wendel is well, I hope?
example.tran: 我想文德尔小姐一切都好吧？

entry.def: If you do one thing in the hope of another thing happening, you do it because you think it might cause or help the other thing to happen, which is what you want.

example.ex: He was studying in the hope of being admitted to an engineering college...
example.tran: 他努力学习，希望能被一所工程学院录取。

example.ex: We will be analysing all the things she has told us in the hope that we can locate the person responsible.
example.tran: 我们将分析她告诉我们的所有事情，希望能找出罪魁祸首。

entry.def: If you live in hope that something will happen, you continue to hope that it will happen, although it seems unlikely, and you realize that you are being foolish.
entry.tran: （在不太可能的情况下）对…继续抱有希望，痴心妄想

example.ex: I just live in hope that one day she'll talk to me...
example.tran: 我只是妄想着有一天她会和我说话。

example.ex: My mother bought lots of tickets and lived in hope of winning the prize.
example.tran: 我母亲买了很多彩票，一心希望能中大奖。

entry.def: If you say 'Some hope', or 'Not a hope', you think there is no possibility that something will happen, although you may want it to happen.

example.ex: The industry reckons it will see orders swell by 10% this financial year. Some hope.
example.tran: 业界估计本财年订单会增加10%。这绝对不可能。

means.word_mean: 1. a specific instance of feeling hopeful;

sentences.sentence: "it revived their hope of winning the pennant"

means.word_mean: 2. the general feeling that some desire will be fulfilled;

sentences.sentence: "in spite of his troubles he never gave up hope"

means.word_mean: 3. grounds for feeling hopeful about the future;

sentences.sentence: "there is little or no promise that he will recover"

means.word_mean: 4. someone (or something) on which expectations are centered;

sentences.sentence: "he was their best hope for a victory"

means.word_mean: 5. one of the three Christian virtues
1. expect and wish;

sentences.sentence: "I trust you will behave better from now on"
"I hope she understands that she cannot expect a raise"

means.word_mean: 2. be optimistic; be full of hope; have hopes;

sentences.sentence: "I am still hoping that all will turn out well"

means.word_mean: 3. intend with some possibility of fulfilment;

sentences.sentence: "I hope to have finished this work by tomorrow evening"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English hopa (noun), hopian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch hoop (noun), hopen (verb), and German hoffen (verb)

means: 希望
指望
希望

heart outcomes prevention evaluation 心脏后果预防评估研究
Help Organize Peace Everywhere 帮助各地组织和平计划
Health Opportunity for People Everywhere 全民保健机会
health opportunities with physical exercise 保健时机和体育运动
霍普（姓氏，女子名）

sentences.en: Now that he has become President, many people once again have hope for genuine changes in the system...

sentences.en: I always knew it was too much to hope for.

sentences.en: She had decided she must go on as usual, follow her normal routine, and hope and pray...

sentences.cn: 我们期望那些威胁度过高的嫌疑暴徒在晚上休息时不再过于安心.
sentences.en: Many a highly placed thug, it is hoped , is beginning to sleep less easily at night.

sentences.en: I certain hope I can answers them for you.

sentences.cn: 但那些期望并未突现.
sentences.en: Those hopes have not been fulfilled.

sentences.cn: 每件事情花了两倍的时间,却得到一半的期望.
sentences.en: Everything takes asas you plan for and produces results about half as good as you hoped.

sentences.cn: 尽管人们对她期望不大,但她最后赢了.
sentences.en: In spite of her poor hopes she finished up the winner.

sentences.en: Management is conducting further acquisition negotiations with companies and hopes tototo a quick and successful close.

sentences.en: I hope you have a wonderful trip to Macau.

sentences.cn: 他们期望政治人物进行有趣的战斗,期望从政治中获得娱乐.
sentences.en: They hope to see politicians in exciting wrangles and to get some fun out of politics.

sentences.en: The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.

sentences.en: FJC devote oneself to the needs of it is run high hope.

sentences.cn: 他的成就没有达到他期望的那麽大.
sentences.en: His achievements had fallen short of his hopes.

sentences.en: But in real life young men who hoped for this denouement were apt to be disappointed.

sentences.en: The U.S. market has risen sharply throughout the springand summer on hopes of a recovery.

sentences.en: As a healer of the spirit I have succeeded beyond my hopes and my deserts.

sentences.en: Only 2.2 percent of them who are coaches had the same hope.

sentences.en: Welcome back to school! I hope everyone had a great Winter break!

sentences.en: I hope this will continue.

sentences.en: We hope that the community views it in the same vein.

sentences.cn: 我希望中国能更充分地接受这一使命,对于一个有着辉煌历史的国家,我相信你们的鼎盛时期还在前头.

sentences.en: American Superconductor is hoping to convince utilities that its technology is the future of electricity transmission.

sentences.en: And so they hope that perhaps war be allowed to continue provided modern weapons are prohibited.

sentences.cn: 爱承担所有的东西, 相信所有的事情, 希望所有的事情, 并且忍受一切事物.
sentences.en: Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, and endures all things.

sentences.cn: 每个人的心里都有一只独角兽,只要你相信, 那份纯真就会存在.
sentences.en: The unicorn is a lonely , solitary creature that symbolizes hope.

sentences.en: A seeker trusts, he hopes; he can wait, he can wait infinitely.

sentences.cn: 林前十三7凡事包容,凡事相信, 凡事盼望,凡事忍耐.

sentences.en: I hope you will be happy all the time, and my best wishes to you!

sentences.en: He hoped that he could convince the jury of his innocence.

sentences.en: Enthusiasts hope that the Berlin reunion will lead to a revival of that plan.

sentences.cn: 但她的丈夫不认为她有她希望的那样是有吸引力的.
sentences.en: But her husband did not think she was magnetic as she hoped.

sentences.en: I do not think you ought to give up all hope of becoming a professional singer.

sentences.en: I think and hope you won't lose heart even if you fail.

sentences.en: We sincerely hope at you will not think us unaccommodating.

sentences.en: Israel as he is known is hoping he will be offered a deal next week.

sentences.cn: 但不是每个人都认为氢燃料电池车是未来汽车业的希望.
sentences.en: But not everyone sees the hydrogen fuel cell bus is as the hope of the future.

sentences.cn: 我完全认为他是恰恰相反.
sentences.en: I have great hopes of finding him quite the reverse.

sentences.cn: 希望你方不要认为我们是不肯通融的.
sentences.en: We sincerely hope that you will not think us unaccommodating.

sentences.cn: 埃文思博士希望鼻部认证可以在更大的范围内被确认为一种有效的识别技术.
sentences.en: Dr Evans hopes the method can proven to be effective on this larger sample.

sentences.cn: 分析家们并不认为这是希望之光.
sentences.en: Analysts were not taking that as much of a ray of hope.

sentences.cn: 茂木先生认为既然龟甲万的酱油是一种优质的产品,应该也不愁找到买家.
sentences.en: Mr Mogi hopes to establish Kikkoman's sauce as a premium product aimed at wealthier buyers.

sentences.cn: 我们盼望着星期天天气好。
